usagePurpose.S: Collaborative interface design tool with real-time collaboration, prototyping, and design system capabilities.

keyFeatures.S: Real-time Collaboration - Multiple designers can work on the same file simultaneously|Vector Graphics Tools - Professional vector editing tools for creating scalable designs|Prototyping - Interactive prototypes with animations and transitions|Design Systems - Reusable components and styles for consistent design

useCases.S: UI/UX design for web and mobile applications|Design system creation and maintenance|Interactive prototyping and user testing|Collaborative design workflow with teams

searchText.S: figma design ui design prototyping collaboration vector graphics interface design
